data.name: Jylko: Through The Song
data.detailed_description:
Jylko: Through The Song is a roguelike / shooter in 2D.

You play as Jylko, who loves to listen to music.
And each time, he lets himself be guided and carried by the notes,
the chords and the instruments, which take him further and further away.

Take part in this journey through music.
Dodge and attack among more than 50 different types of enemies.
Rooms are randomly generated.
Tons and tons of projectiles to dodge.
Carefully choose your equipment to become stronger with over 120 unique items.
Defeats the bosses to go even further.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Jylko: Through The Song is a roguelike with an important difficulty. Combine your attacks with your dash and make your way through the enemies and bosses. Choose your equipment and your decisions well to try to go as far as possible.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discreet video card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 2xx-Series and up
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
